## Desktop Pet Interaction
Bring a playful companion to your desktop with Desktop Pet Interaction. Choose from a variety of adorable pets including Penguins, Otters, Chickens, Racoons, and Geckos. Watch as your chosen pet moves around your screen, takes breaks, and responds to your interactions.

### Features
- **Interactive Pets:** Draw a random pet and see it come to life on your screen.
- **Multiple Pet Types:** Choose from Penguins, Otters, Chickens, Racoons, and Geckos.
- **Pet States:** Watch your pet move, rest, and stop at random intervals.
- **Drag and Drop:** Easily drag your pet to different positions on your screen.
- **Pomodoro Timer:** Use the built-in Pomodoro timer to manage your work sessions with your pet by your side.

### How to Use
1. **Install the Extension:** Add Desktop Pet Interaction to your browser.
2. **Sign In:** Open the extension popup and sign in with your Google account.
3. **Draw a Pet:** Click the "Lucky Draw a Pet" button to get a random pet.
4. **Show/Hide Pet:** Use the "Show/Hide Pet" button to display or hide your pet on the screen.
5. **Timer:** Utilize the "Start Timer" and "Reset Timer" buttons to keep track of your work sessions.

### Permissions
- **Storage:** To save your chosen pet and settings.
- **Identity:** To sign in with your Google account and link your pet to your account.

### Feedback
We value your feedback! Please leave a review or contact us with any suggestions or issues you encounter. Enjoy your new desktop companion!
